title: Print, Versailles, Groves of the Garden, the Ballroom, 1730
title_raw: Versailles, Groves of the Garden, the Ballroom
medium: Etching and engraving. Black ink on rolled paper.
inscribed:
Engraved on the plate at lower left:  "J. Rigaud In. Sculp."  
Top left of plate:  "B"
Lower center:  "Vues des Bosquets du Jardin de Versaille.  La Salle du Bal.  Cette salle est de forme un peu ovale.  Elle est bordee d'un amphitheatre de gazon, et d'une magnifique cascade decoree de rocailles avec des bassins a coquilleages.  Les goulettes, les socles, et les rampes des Intervalles sont de marbre jaspe.  Les vases et les torcheres sont de metal dore."
Numbered lower right:  "55"
description: Horizontal rectangle:  In the foreground strolling courtiers and dogs.  In the middle a depressed lawn area, at the right of which there is a bank of cascades with basins, jets and urns.  At the left, tiers of seats.  Hedges surround the area with woods beyond.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Versailles, Groves of the Garden, the Ballroom, 1730. Etching and engraving. Black ink on rolled paper.. 
1972-7-19.
